notes: Luxury high-rise apartment on the top floor (11F) with modern finishes including recessed LED lighting, polished tile floors, open-plan kitchen with built-in appliances, and floor-to-ceiling windows offering excellent natural light. The glass coffee table has sharp corners that would need baby-proofing, and the balcony with sliding glass doors requires attention for child safety. Very clean and well-maintained condition with no visible red flags.
